definition: the act of competing as for profit or a prize
details:
noun
- the act of competing as for profit or a prize
= synonyms: contention, rivalry
- an occasion on which a winner is selected from among two or more contestants
= synonyms: contest
- the contestant you hope to defeat
= synonyms: rival, challenger, competitor, contender
- a business relation in which two parties compete to gain customers
= example: a business relation in which two parties compete to gain customers
